elements.text:
In a meeting with a few colleagues and your boss, your boss calls on you to answer a question. You say your best answer and your coworkers are quiet.

Here are some thoughts that might pop into mind:

texts: My answer sounded dumb because I didn't understand the question, but no one will remember tomorrow.
My coworkers are judging my answer.
It was nice to be able to share what I think.
I didn't communicate my point as well as I would have liked this time, but I know I'll have more opportunities to speak up in the future.
